synopsis.text: March 1999: In an eerie echo of an encounter four years prior, Mikiya Kokutou finds himself face-to-face with Shiki Ryougi at the exact same location where their paths first crossed. As snowflakes dance around them, the pair engage in a conversation that weaves together fragments of their shared history. Yet, as the dialogue unfolds, Mikiya becomes increasingly aware of an unsettling truth: the Shiki standing before him is not the one he once knew, but an entirely different being residing within her form... (Source: Aniplex USA)
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
